```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}

check <- read_csv(here("_analysis/check_final_rasters.csv"))

check %>%
  filter(file %in% grep("whea", check$file, value=TRUE))

check %>%
  filter(file %in% grep("barl", check$file, value=TRUE))


check %>%
  filter(file %in% grep("broiler", check$file, value=TRUE)) %>%
  filter(file %in% grep("consumption", file, value=TRUE, invert=TRUE))

check %>%
  filter(file %in% grep("feedfish", check$file, value=TRUE))

```
